name: LinkedDark
description:
LinkedIn Dark Theme
Others were broken or incomplete, I tried my best to make this not be.

To report issues, please use https://github.com/Jordy3D/Jordy3D.github.io/issues
UserStyles is dreadful.
additional_info:
Gonna start logging updates from this one

Update 1:
- Added sections that were ignored or missed on the site (Mostly on the Jobs page and company pages)
- Updated some sections that were off-colour or overlooked (Drop-down menus mostly here)

Update 2:
- Added the whole Public Profile control page 
- Added a tonne of details from more fleshed out user pages, such as Recommendations
- Updated the People Also Viewed section

Update 3: 
- Added a few missing connection pages
- Updated the top of the Keep Connecting window
- Updated a bunch of hover events

Update 4:
- Updated some things that changes with natural webpage changes

Update 5: 
- Some pages were changed so this updated to match at least the more obvious places
- Updated the Search menu, which also changed on LinkedIn's end

Update 6: 
- LinkedIn Salary

Update 7:
- Minor changes that have been missed in previous updates

Update 8:
- Updated the Make a Post window since I had never used it before.

Update 9:
- Updated the comments section
- Updated an odd See More gradient that appeared

Update 10:
- Invite things! I hadn't received one before, so now that I have I could see what was missing
- Some "More People You May Know" stuff was changed, updated to keep up

Update 11:
- Missed a few minor things in 10, fixed now

Update 12: 
- Skills window had a lot of missing elements. Could still be more but I can't see them for now

Update 13: 
- Minor things that should not have changed were changed. I just caught up.

Update 14:
- Minor things
- Chat box
- Comments section

Update 15: 
- Minor things
- Profile dropdown
- Write an article
- Some hover events
- Input placeholder text

Update 16:
- Article Display changes
- Article Comment changes

Update 17: THE OVERHAUL
- LinkedIn did a fairly large overhaul on their front-end (as ZacharyTails brought to my attention below), so this is a complete overhaul of the old CSS. Given that this is fresh CSS now, it may be missing parts, so be sure to let me know at the GitHub link above.

Update 18: 
- Missed a few things from 17 that I noticed afterwards. Same info from above applies though, be sure to let me know if you find anything!

Update 19:
- Missed a few thigns from 18... Well, I couldn't see them til I did. LinkedIn Offers should look updated now

Update 20:
- Poll posts should now be appropriately dark
- A few dropdowns were missing and have now been covered

Update 21:
- Some experience stuff wasn't dark, now is
- "Who Viewed Your Profile" stuff now dark

Update 22:
- Minor update to Profile page
- Non-signed in users now have a slightly nicer experience

Update 23:
- Update to the Search page
- Minor update to Feed
- Minor updates elsewhere

Update 24:
- Update to Profile Page
- Update to Featured Items on your profile

Update 25:
- Update to Job pages
- Update to Employer pages

Update 26:
- Update to Profile Edit sections
- Minor update to main Feed
- Update to Log-In screens

Update 27:
- Update to Post menu
- Update to Post View 
- Update to minor Feed buttons
- Minor change to Messaging box
- Minor update to support Special Day infoboxes

Update 28:
- Update to Jobs Based On Your Profile
- Minor updates to other areas
css:
@-moz-document domain("linkedin.com") {
/*Dark Scrollbar*/
::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 10px; }
::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: #fff0 !important; }
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: #1f2f38; }
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover { background: #1a2a33; }

:root, body, html,

.theme--mercado .msg-overlay-bubble-header,
.artdeco-modal, .modal-wormhole-content,

#component-container,

.msg-spinmail-thread__top-banner,

{

  box-shadow: none !important;
}

{

{
  border-left:  4px solid #cccccc13 !important;
}

.secondary-nav-bar__nav-item:last-child::before
{
    border-left: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, .2) !important;
}

.theme--mercado .feed-follow-nav__active-link
{
  border-bottom:  3px solid #057642 !important;
}

{
  border-color: #057642 !important;
}

.share-content-type-drawer__arrow--bottom::after,
.share-creation-state__comment-controls-tooltip.ui-inline-tooltip--arrow-bottom .ui-inline-tooltip__caret
{
  border-color: #162228 transparent !important;

}

input[type=checkbox]:not(:checked)+label:before, input[type=radio]:not(:checked)+label:before,
input[type=checkbox]:not(:checked):hover+label:before, input[type=radio]:not(:checked):hover+label:before
{
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #ccc5 !important;
}

.toast__dismiss,
.intent-module .chevron-right-icon path,
.cta-modal__dismiss-icon path,

#app__container .footer__base-item-v3 path,
#app__container .footer__base-item-v3 polygon,

.linkedin-text path, .linkedin-text polygon
{
  fill: #ccc;
}

.footer-social-icon-link use
{
  fill: #ccc !important;
}

clearImage 
{
    filter: invert(1) hue-rotate(180deg) saturate(2) brightness(.8);
    mix-blend-mode: color-dodge;
}

.theme--mercado .pv-entity__extra-details .inline-show-more-text__button:hover
{
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.app-footer-v3__item-logo img
{
  filter: invert(1);
}

#setting-change-password .content .save-container .save:disabled, #setting-change-password .content .save-container .save[disabled]
{
  opacity: .25;
}

.flexible-column-frame.parbase.section .flexible-column-frame-background,

.profile-background-image--loading
{
  filter: invert(1) hue-rotate(180deg) brightness(.8);
  mix-blend-mode: screen;
}

.pv-entity__logo-img, .pv-entity__play-icon
{
  filter: invert(1) hue-rotate(190deg) saturate(4) brightness(1.2);
  mix-blend-mode: exclusion;
}

#globalfooter-select_language
{
  filter: invert(0)
}
